job_title: Certified Surgical Technologist (CST) in Cadiz, KY
pros: Good place to work for when you have a good team.

pros: Coworkers, close morale with fellow staff
cons: The direct managers truly truly to help their staff. However, those in the higher up administration do not care. They only see numbers, not acuity of patients so nurses end up overworked to dangerous situations. Also, health care insurance benefits are awful.

review_title: it's a great job for the right person
pros: The department really is like family. They will look out for you no matter what. The work load is more than reasonable and there's never a sense of tension or pressure to over perform. Benefits and work/life balance is good.
cons: This is a small town hospital and if you're not used to this kind of environment you might not function well here. Honestly, the most important thing at this job is maintaining good repport with your coworkers. Even if you perform well, if you come in with the wrong attitude or tick off the wrong person, you absolutely can lose your job or at the very least the quality of your work environment. Be the bigger person. Don't work too hard to buck against the status quo here. Also the director is universally not respected and kind of just there for show. Sorry man.

job_title: Anonymous Employee in Saint Augustine, FL
pros: The work week is only  Mon - Thursday and no holidays.

review_title: Lots of friendly staff, many employee events. You really feel appreciated working here.
